text: Ekumncameni kwabo, babamba intlanganiso bucala omdala kubo wathi: “Anazi na okokuba utata wenu uthabathe isifungo kuni eGameni lika-Allâh, yaye ngaphambili kunoku nasilela ukwenza uxanduva lwenu ngoYûsuf? Ngoko ke mna andiyi kulishiya eli lizwe ade utata wam andivumele, okanye uAllâh Enze isigqibo ngemeko yam (ngokuphathelene noBhenjamini) yaye Yena (uAllâh) nguYena Mgwebi Ulungileyo kubagwebi
